info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 2:12PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hudson, Union, Essex and Richmond Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 212 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Plainfield, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newark, Jersey City, Elizabeth, Passaic, Bayonne, Plainfield, Bloomfield, Linden, Orange, Summit, Millburn, Secaucus, Harrison, Port Richmond and Kearny. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
